title: ICAI Releases Draft Bank Branch Auditors' Panel (MEF) for 2025-26
content:
# ICAI Releases Draft Bank Branch Auditors' Panel (MEF) for 2025-26

Ek important update hai! The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI) ne Bank Branch Auditors' Panel (MEF) ka Draft for the year 2025-26 announce kiya hai.

*   **Kya hai update?** ICAI ne Professional Development Committee ke through Draft Bank Branch Auditors' Panel (MEF) for the year 2025-26 (Financial Year 2025-26, Assessment Year 2026-27) release kar diya hai.
*   **Kahan dekhein?** Yeh draft panel www.meficai.org par host kiya gaya hai.
*   **Kya details milengi?** Applicants apni MEF No./FRN or MRN (individuals ke case mein) enter karke apni details jaise ki MEF Number, FRN Number, Name of the Applicant, Unique Code Number, Category, District aur ineligibility ka reason (agar koi hai) check kar sakte hain. Category change hone ka reason bhi panel mein dikhega.
*   **Query kaise raise karein?** Agar aapko koi observations, queries ya complaints hain, toh aap https://app.meficai.org/complaints par details ke saath raise kar sakte hain ya diye gaye contact numbers par call kar sakte hain.
*   **Last Date:** Yeh Draft Panel Friday, January 30, 2026, tak available rahega. Queries address hone ke baad, final panel Reserve Bank of India (RBI) ko forward kiya jayega.

Yeh panel RBI ke March 06, 2023, ko issued norms ke according prepare kiya gaya hai.

## Read the Official Document
*   [Download the Official Notification/Circular here](https://www.icai.org/post.html?post_id=22731)

*Published on: 25 January 2026*
